info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 530 PM MST... At 500 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sugarloaf Mountain, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Visibility below 3 miles in blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Round Valley, Ballantine Trailhead, Sugarloaf Mountain, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Punkin Center, Tonto Basin, Rio Verde and Fort McDowell. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 197 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 254 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
